name: nativescript-ripple
description: NativeScript plugin to add Material Design ripple effects to any layout.

scripts.demo.ios: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns emulate ios
scripts.demo.android: npm run preparedemo && cd demo && tns run android
scripts.preparedemo: npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-ripple && tns plugin add .. && tns install
scripts.setup: cd demo && npm install && cd .. && npm run build && cd demo && tns plugin add .. && cd ..
